results.title: Atherosclerotic Plaque Fissuration and Clinical Outcomes in Pre-Diabetics vs. Normoglycemics Patients Affected by Asymptomatic Significant Carotid Artery Stenosis at 2 Years of Follow-Up: Role of microRNAs Modulation: The ATIMIR Study
results.text_hl: Thus, we might speculate that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@'s pleiotropic effects might consequently reduce the MACE in @<m>DISEASE_Carotid_Stenosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D016893 @@@ACAS@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@pre-diabetes@@@.

results.title: Activated AMPK Protects Against Chronic Cerebral Ischemia in Bilateral Carotid Artery Stenosis Mice.
results.text_hl: We used four groups of 3-month-old male @CELLLINE_CVCL:C0MU @@@C57BL/6@@@ @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@ labeled as Sham, @<m>DISEASE_Carotid_Stenosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D016893 @@@BCAS@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Carotid_Stenosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D016893 @@@BCAS@@@ + @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ treatment (@<m>DISEASE_Carotid_Stenosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D016893 @@@BCAS@@@ + @CHEMICAL_Methionine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008715 @@@Met@@@) and @<m>DISEASE_Carotid_Stenosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D016893 @@@BCAS@@@ + @GENE_PRKAA2 @GENE_108079 @@@AMPKalpha2@@@ gene knockout (@<m>DISEASE_Carotid_Stenosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D016893 @@@BCAS@@@ + KO).

results.title: Neutrophil gelatinase associated lipocalin (NGAL) is elevated in type 2 diabetics with carotid artery stenosis and reduced under metformin treatment
results.text_hl: @GENE_LCN2 @GENE_3934 @@@Neutrophil gelatinase associated lipocalin@@@ (@GENE_LCN2 @GENE_3934 @@@NGAL@@@) is elevated in @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@type 2 diabetics@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Carotid_Stenosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D016893 @@@carotid artery stenosis@@@ and reduced under @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ treatment

results.title: Metformin, lipids and atherosclerosis prevention.
results.text_hl: In addition, observational studies have provided novel insights into the mechanisms of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@'s effects on @<m>DISEASE_Carotid_Stenosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D016893 @@@carotid plaque@@@, monocytes/macrophages, vascular smooth muscle and endothelial cells, including via @GENE_PRKAA2 @GENE_5563 @@@5'-adenosine monophosphate-activated protein kinase@@@ (@GENE_PRKAA2 @GENE_5563 @@@AMPK@@@) activation.

citations.NLM: Jenkins AJ, Welsh P, Petrie JR. Metformin, lipids and atherosclerosis prevention. Curr Opin Lipidol. 2018 Aug;29(4):346-353. PMID: 29878903

results.title: AMPKalpha inactivation destabilizes atherosclerotic plaque in streptozotocin-induced diabetic mice through AP-2alpha/miRNA-124 axis.
results.text_hl: Further, @SPECIES_10508 @@@adenovirus@@@-mediated AMPKalpha gain of function remitted the process of @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes@@@-induced plaque destabilization in Apoe-/- @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@ injected with @CHEMICAL_Streptozocin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013311 @@@streptozotocin@@@. Administration of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ enhanced @GENE_PLPP1 @GENE_19012 @@@pAP-2alpha@@@ level, reduced miR-124 expression, and increased @GENE_P4HA1 @GENE_18451 @@@P4Halpha1@@@ and collagens in @<m>DISEASE_Carotid_Stenosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D016893 @@@carotid@@@ @DISEASE_Plaque_Atherosclerotic @DISEASE_MESH:D058226 @@@atherosclerotic plaque@@@ in @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetic@@@ Apoe-/- @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@.

citations.NLM: Liang WJ, Zhou SN, Shan MR, Wang XQ, Zhang M, Chen Y, Zhang Y, Wang SX, Guo T. AMPKalpha inactivation destabilizes atherosclerotic plaque in streptozotocin-induced diabetic mice through AP-2alpha/miRNA-124 axis. J Mol Med (Berl). 2018 May;96(5):403-412. PMID: 29502204
